attributes.action: ask Her Majesty the Queen to grant the prefix 'Royal' to Wooton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recognition of the dignity,determination and dedication that the citizens of Wooton Bassett have shown in mourning the loss of British service personnel killed on duty overseas, we would ask the Prime Minister to enquire of Her Majesty the Queen if the town may be granted the prefix 'Royal' as a symbol of her,and the nation's gratitude.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
